title: Placement at end of the season
body: Will i got silver border and icon... if is my mmr lower than my division

replies.body: Season rewards will be based on the placement you end at.  If you finish Silver, then you will receive silver rewards regardless of your MMR.  More information on the season rewards can also be found [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon).  Let me know if you have any questions!
